title: FDA Open Meeting on Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 Vaccine, Part 4
description: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) held a virtual open meeting to discuss emergency use authorization for the Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine. The advisory board heard public comments about the vaccine created by Janssen Biotech, which is the pharmaceutical division of Johnson & Johnson. Discussed were the efficacy of the vaccine, the importance of delivering a one-dose versus a two-dose vaccine, side effects experienced by study participants, and possible complications related to unmasking trial participants. This was the fourth portion of the daylong advisory board hearing.
